medium: Ink and color on paper with lacquer (urushi-e)
text: Trained as a painter, Shibata Zeshin also received critical acclaim for his lacquer designs. He championed a technique of painting with lacquer on paper and silk, a difficult process but one that gives an appealing luster to his renderings. Each of the six leaves of this album shows his masterly use of this unusual medium.
title: Album of Lacquer Pictures by the Venerable Zeshin
